tagline: Turns raw information into connected, findable knowledge that's actually useful six months later
pros: Transforms messy notes into structured, linked knowledge
Designs retrieval-first note systems that scale
Progressive summarization gives access at any detail level
Cross-references reveal connections you'd never notice
cons: Synthesis takes time — not instant turnaround for complex input
System design requires understanding how the person thinks
Can't generate original analysis from the information it organizes

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
